name: HappyPills
description: A web application for ordering happy pills with a user-friendly interface. I made this project to explore DOM programming. I used Html to code the website and Javascript to highlight the pill container images when selected. The website itself is a silly creation I came up with to illustrate the absurd idea of selling recreational possibly illegal drugs online.

name: LibraryDatabase
description: A database system for managing library books and member accounts. This is the project Im most proud of due to how extensive and varied the code is. I used a Spring Boot framework to create this application with Java and HTML. You can create user and admin accounts that have a fully functioning security program although for demonstration purposes anyone can create an admin account.

name: OurSolarSystem
description: An interactive guide to the solar system and its planets. This project uses more advanced DOM programming.
